short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension is use to call native exe that send eid infos back

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension we can read an eid (belgium citizen) and get back informations directly in the caller. The extension is called from a website and then call a local exe use to read the eid.
The exe send the infos back to the extension and then to the web site.
Inside the debug folder there are a msi use to install the exe on the client pc
